moves.1. e4: HELLO fellow chess addicts!Here is a short game for my fans,followers,friends and of course those WATCHERS!!!!Okay before i start faithful few that look at these iam about to start to  annotate games i have lost.I know this is a shock to some of you so brace yourself because i have lost some games.Because lets be honest folks,it is virtually IMPOSSIBLE to play a couple hundred or more chess games and not lose.I suspect the only way a  person could do this is by using computer or partners.Okay here we go.He opens with e4
moves.1... d6: Going to do a little different d6
moves.5. Ng5: Attack i believe dual attack by Ng5 and Bc4
moves.5... Bg4 6. Qe1: Looking to bring his queen into play
moves.7. Nxf7: I knew it  and  still let it happen blunder by me
moves.7... Qd7: Move queen to save her still needllessly lose Rh8
moves.9. d3 Nd4: Further incursion into enemy territory.I should have moved Qd7-Qe8
moves.10. Qc3: Here is attack coming as i suspected i spoke of earlier
moves.10... Be2: Now i start my attack wikth bishop,queen,knight combo
moves.11... Qg4: Back off my REV i say!!
moves.12. Be3: I see he relizing the hiredgun is coming
moves.13... Qh5 14. g4: GOT YOU NOW!!We have a saying in south georgia USA"YOU DON"T FOLLOW A RATTLESNAKE IN  THE BUSHES"you dont look around and see danger
moves.14... Qxh3: Only matter of time now king is sitting duck
moves.15. Bg5: "TOO MUCH TO LITTLE TO LATE TO EVER TRY AGAIN"-to quote a classic RB SONG
moves.15... Nxg4: Do you see queen ,bishop and knight combo?
moves.16... Qh2#: BOOM THERE IT IS TARGET LIGUIDATED!!!!!!Asalways postive feedback accepted negative tolerated.GOOD CHESS TO ALL!!
